Attacks.Name: Tackle
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character gains the Slow special condition until the end of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Razor Leaf
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores cover provided by terrain. If a wild is rolled, you may reroll one failure.

Attacks.Name: Magical Leaf
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores defense dice granted by the target's superpowers.

Superpowers.Name: Overgrow
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 2 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its 'Razor Leaf' attack by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Aromatherapy
Superpowers.Effect: Remove one special condition from this character and each allied character within range.

Attacks.Name: Leaf Storm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character suffers 1 damage unless it has already activated this round.

Superpowers.Name: Leaf Guard
Superpowers.Effect: While this character has no special conditions, it adds 1 die to its Defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Bayleef character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
